title: removing Facebook from my computer
content: Could you please tell me how to remove Facebook from my computer. I signed on years ago when a friend told me to look at her photos on Facebook, but I have never really wanted it, and never have used it in many years. Today Facebook contacted me telling me that very old messages were on my Facebook, and I do not want to be contacted, so need to remove it so that can't happen, Thanking you for your help
creator: francesatgreen

title: New Tab page doesn't show background images (only gray) - Light mode is a little broken
content:
Problems:

  1. The New Tab page doesn't show background images - doesn't go into Light Mode
  2. When Light Mode is enabled, certain UI related to Firefox-related pages break

Did I accidentally touch some CSS or about:config elements I wasn't supposed to? I honestly don't know lol


Additional Notes:

  • Applies to custom and default backgrounds (the author's info shows up)
  • "Reset to default" didn't help
  • I removed all extensions
  • Themes work fine - Issue happens with or without them enabled
  • Everything else on New Tab works fine
  • Provided screenshots showcasing it all (including Light Mode oddities)
creator: alejandromartinez2125

title: Firefox doesn't send login codes to my email.
content: I tried to log in to NextDoor, which was supposed to send by email a 6-digit login code for me to enter. I tried at least twice, and no code was received. I'm using Firefox 128.12.0esr on a Mac running Catalina 10.15.7. Logging in to NextDoor from a Brave browser worked just fine, including getting the code by email. How to I fix this?
creator: nqyqmn62wf
